title: Optimization of vine killing date for maximum seed-tuber yield and minimum exposure to late-season aphid vectors in potato
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Prince Kumar, Raj Kumar, Mohd Abas Shah, Rajesh Kumar Singh, Ashwani Kumar Sharma, Raj Kumar, Anil Sharma, Jagdev Sharma, Brajesh Singh, Ravinder Kumar
